attribute.name: drlSettings
attribute.value: <setting> <actions> <ifType> <name>IfSWDrawing</name> <types> <type>SW Drawing</type> </types> <actions> <forEach> <name>forEachBOMPart</name> <query>expand bus ${id} rel 'Part Specification' select bus id select relationship id</query> <ofTypes> <type>Part</type> </ofTypes> <actions> <ifCondition> <name>IfNotReleasedorObsolete</name> <conditions> <condition leftHandSource="attribute" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Released"/> <condition leftHandSource="attribute" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Obsolete"/> </conditions> <actions> <actionActivity name="CopySWDrawingAttributesToBOMPart"/> </actions> </ifCondition> </actions> </forEach> </actions> </ifType> </actions> </setting>
